medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient is an asymptomatic man in his 40s who presented for evaluation of primary hyperparathyroidism. His preoperative serum calcium level was 12.3 mg/dL, and the condition was discovered during routine evaluation.
medical_history.family_history: Several first-degree relatives underwent parathyroidectomy, and a brother has a stomach acid tumor.
